segments.text: All I do all day is work and watch TV . I really should start thinking about my health .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I never thought about that , but you're right . What do you think we should do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For starters , we should start doing more outdoor activities . That way we'll get some exercise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was thinking about taking tennis lessons . I always have an hour to spare in the afternoon . What do you think about that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not a bad idea . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard it is only about one hundred twenty dollars a month for 8 lessons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Playing tennis twice a week will be a good start . Count me in .
segments.speaker: S1
